column2:
Welcome to the world of Hack! Here, you can learn the secrets of the world you live in, and how to make them work for you.

If that sounds magical and mysterious, don't worry - we're here to help you learn.
My name's Ada - I've been around the Academy for a while. I'll be your guide.
That was actually me at the entrance puzzle - I didn't want to distract you by introducing myself.
Great job on the entrance puzzle! Not many students solve that without help.

Now that we're here, there's a lot to go over. This main area is called 'The Clubhouse.'

It's a virtual place where people from The Academy can hang out, chat, and collaborate. 

We might be in different physical locations, but we all come together here.
Talk to anyone you like - it's the quickest way to start having fun and learning.

Did you notice that your cursor and desktop are different? That's because we're in Hack Mode now.

When you're in Hack Mode, you can flip programs and hack them - just like that puzzle.
Hack Mode is controlled by that switch *over there* - See it?
If you switch it to OFF, you’ll go back to the regular desktop - No hacking tools, and it'll shut down the Clubhouse, too.
You might want to turn Hack Mode off if someone else needs to use the computer, or you need to do your homework.
[The button in the upper right] is the Pathways button - if you know exactly what you want to learn or do, go here.
Pathways organize all the activities we have into categories, so you can go directly to the one you want.
[Over here] is your profile.
The system for remote students is still in progress sonn you'll be able to decide who you want to be in the world of Hack - it’s up to you!
That includes your name, {{user_name}}.
If you'd like to change what we call you, you can click the picture in the far lower right corner of your screen.
Then, you can click that same picture again in the menu, and it'll take you to the Settings app.
From there, you can set your name to whatever you like, and we'll use that.
Now that the basics are out of the way, I think Dr. Rowe had an activity for you try.
He's the one with the glasses and big beard, you can't miss him.
Catch you later!
